meanings: speech (on/about), address, (formal) oration, speak, address, make[deliver, give] a speech

vlive.korean: '오늘 내 생일이야 연설 좀 해줄래?' "Today is my speech. Can you give a speech?" 듣기 View video iKON : 새벽라이브
vlive.english: "Today is my speech. Can you give a speech?"

vlive.korean: [갑자기 인생 연설하는 토끼와] 그래서 인생은 완벽하지 않아요? [This bunny starts a speech about life] That's why our lives are perfect. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [MONSTA X] 바이브 절단부터 접합까지 -몬베베 생일파티에서 생긴일🎂⚙️- (MONBEBE’s 4th anniversary +1)
vlive.english: [This bunny starts a speech about life] That's why our lives are perfect.

vlive.korean: 내가 뭐 연설했냐? Did I give a speech? 듣기 View video OSEN : '스타로드' AB6IX, 벌칙의 주인공은? #EP 06
유엔총회 연설까지! to the point where he... He gave a speech at the UN Summit! 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 달 달 무슨달?
vlive.english: to the point where he... He gave a speech at the UN Summit!

vlive.korean: 남준 씨 UN에서 연설했습니까? 안 했습니까? RM, did you deliver a speech at the UN or not? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.77
vlive.english: RM, did you deliver a speech at the UN or not?

examples.korean: a speech that appealed to the rabble 발음듣기 일반 대중에게 호소한 연설 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a speech that appealed to the rabble 발음

examples.korean: The tone of the speech was upbeat. 발음듣기 그 연설의 어조는 낙관적이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The tone of the speech was upbeat. 발음

examples.korean: His voice faltered as he began his speech. 발음듣기 연설을 시작할 때 그의 목소리가 흔들렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His voice faltered as he began his speech. 발음

examples.korean: His speech was one of great triviality. 발음듣기 그의 연설은 대단히 시시한 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His speech was one of great triviality. 발음

examples.korean: His speech was greeted by a roar of applause. 발음듣기 그의 연설은 요란한 박수를 받았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His speech was greeted by a roar of applause. 발음
